name: Web Developer Training

name: Senior Product Manager
description: +15% click-through-rate leading to +3% CVR through modernised and optimized homepage
Product Manager of two cross-functional Scrum teams - Product Configuration Team and Marketing Tech Team - during refactoring & redesign of webshop

Lead product discovery & design, collect requirements, stakeholder management, prioritization of product backlogs, ensuring product delivery in a timely manner of homepage and product detail pages for glasses and sunglasses as well as glass options pages

name: Product Manager
description: +5% CM2 p.a. for glasses category through improvements of mobile customer journey, +3,5% CM2 p.a. with virtual try-on, +3% CM2 p.a. launching customer own frame

Implemented data-driven decision-making processes to continuously improve product performance and customer satisfaction
Analyzed and monitored product performance through key metrics and reports, providing insights and recommendations for improvement

name: Technical SEO Manager
